welcome_message_body: Welcome to Krishnanagar, a city known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all the charm this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Wow! Momo

restaurants.address: No 13, Ward No 19,MM Ghosh Road (Krishnagar), Krishnanagar 741101, West Bengal
